Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI, ViewListenerSubscriber
public class CLI extends Object implements UI
This class implements the CLI interface.
